title: FS: Cicotte Sov150, Waddell Pied150 - BOTH SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: Cicotte Sov150, Waddell Pied150 - BOTH SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have this pair available for sale. The Waddell just has a good color common with his 150 backs and the Cicotte is the much tougher Sov150 vs his Sov350.

$SOLD Waddell
$SOLD Cicotte 

I’m available via PM to discuss. Anyone saying “I’ll take it” or “Sold” gets priority over ongoing negotiations.

Thanks for looking!
